c30d3ba2-b023-4b76-8db9-9a1bec02392b.description: Earners of the Software Architect Software Security Practitioner (SSP) Designation will acquire a deeper understanding of secure software coding and design techniques as well as learn the vulnerabilities common to the OWASP Top 10. Completion of the Software Architect SSP Suite improves foundational knowledge of the key techniques required to reducing risk in the development lifecycle as well as correctly identifying potential threats.
c30d3ba2-b023-4b76-8db9-9a1bec02392b.name: Software Security Practitioner - Software Architect

alignments.name: Aligned with the (ISC)²
alignments.description: A unique program jointly developed and offered in partnership with the International Information System Security Certification Consortium (ISC)², the SSP program offers role-based training paths that allow learners to earn an (ISC)² certificate relevant to their role.

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the AppSec Fundamentals course.
Successful completion of the Secure Software Requirements course.
Successful completion of the Secure Software Design course.
Successful completion of the OWASP Top 10 course.
Successful completion of the Threat Model Express course.
Successful completion of the Software Acceptance course.
Successful completion of the SSP - Software Architect exam.

538d61bc-8e6d-49c5-9667-7f8d3c48e630.description: Earners of the Defending Java Software Security Practitioner (SSP) Designation will acquire a deeper understanding of secure software coding and design techniques as well as learn the Java vulnerabilities common to the OWASP Top 10. Completion of the Java SSP Suite improves foundational knowledge of defensive coding that can be applied to a Java practitioner’s daily tasks and will help improve their organization’s overall security posture.
538d61bc-8e6d-49c5-9667-7f8d3c48e630.name: Software Security Practitioner - Defending Java

45c41284-e179-4615-8460-9fe7fec40123.description: The General Software Security Practitioner (SSP) Designation provides fundamental application security knowledge as well as a deep dive into the OWASP’s Top 10 list of known vulnerabilities. Completion of the General SSP Suite will help the earner improve their organization’s overall security posture when they begin applying their newfound application security techniques to their role/tasks.
45c41284-e179-4615-8460-9fe7fec40123.name: Software Security Practitioner - General

alignments.name: Aligned with the (ISC)²
alignments.description: A unique program jointly developed and offered in partnership with the International Information System Security Certification Consortium (ISC)², the SSP program offers role-based training paths that allow learners to earn an (ISC)² certificate relevant to their role.

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Security Awareness course.
Successful completion of the AppSec Fundamentals course.
Successful completion of the OWASP Top 10 course.
Successful completion of the SSP - General exam.

dd633b22-ce1e-4ad2-9318-4fcdba90fdcc.description: Earners of the Quality Assurance Software Security Practitioner (SSP) Designation will acquire the ability to critically analyze code and gain a deeper understanding of the principles of software testing from a security perspective. Completion of the Quality Assurance SSP Suite hones the ability to define important security criteria thereby helping improve their organization’s overall security posture.
dd633b22-ce1e-4ad2-9318-4fcdba90fdcc.name: Software Security Practitioner - Quality Assurance

alignments.name: Aligned with the (ISC)²
alignments.description: A unique program jointly developed and offered in partnership with the International Information System Security Certification Consortium (ISC)², the SSP program offers role-based training paths that allow learners to earn an (ISC)² certificate relevant to their role.

Successful completion of the Secure Software Testing course.

Successful completion of the OWASP Top 10 course.
Successful completion of the SSP - Quality Assurance exam.

69c58f2f-fea7-4269-bb1e-7c2e1d55d66e.description: Earners of the Project Management Software Security Practitioner (SSP) Designation will acquire a deeper understanding of secure software requirements, coding, concepts, and design by analyzing the full development lifecycle. Completion of the Project Management SSP Suite hones the ability to define important security criteria that will allow software to be promoted for release, thereby helping improve their organization’s overall security posture.
69c58f2f-fea7-4269-bb1e-7c2e1d55d66e.name: Software Security Practitioner - Project Management
